spared.processing.get_glob_exp_frac

spared.processing.get_glob_exp_frac(adata: AnnData) → AnnData[source]

Compute the global expression fraction for each gene in the dataset.

This function computes the global expression fraction for each gene in the dataset. Internally it computes the fraction of non-zero observations for each gene across all the slides in the collection.

Parameters:

adata (ad.AnnData) – A slide collection where a non expressed gene is defined as having a value of 0 in the adata.X matrix.

Returns:

The updated slide collection with the glob_exp_frac added to the var dataframe.

Return type:

ad.AnnData
